name: Five Nights In The Void 2
description:
ANDROID VERSION IN THE WORKS

Another FNAF game, but this time, with Geo Characters!

There are 2 characters introduced each night, with many different mechanics! Some examples are:

Poligon the humanoid cat-furry. Canonically he can split apart.

Blade is a green blob with a tail, but watch out for his... well, blade.

Dnelb speaks with very low quality, but is the most similiar to Geo!

PurPur, a cute Amethyst with DNA implanted from a bomb, back when the void was first housing Geo creatures.

Except, they are all corrupt by the same energy from the first game, and you need to survive. Make sure Geo is safe, too!
